What you'll get

  • Learnt learning and communications platform
  • 12 months access to the platform and courseware
  • 24/7 support for you and your team

What will be learnt

  • Positive mental health & well-being during COVID-19
  • Health & Safety Leadership
  • Manage stress in the workplace
  • Networking -How & WHy
  • Apply critical thinking skills in a team environment
  • Develop a marketing plan
  • Apply customer service skills
  • Manage Finance within a budget
  • Sell products and services
  • Develop & Implement a business plan
